original: Hetuṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

original: Nahetuṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ▁nahetu ṃ ▁sukh āya ▁vedanāya ▁sampayutt aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nahetu ▁na sukh āya ▁vedanāya ▁sampayutt o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā

original: Hetuṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca nahetuṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁hetu ṃ ▁sukh āya ▁vedanāya ▁sampayutt añca ▁nahetu ṃ ▁sukh āya ▁vedanāya ▁sampayutt añca ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nahetu ▁na sukh āya ▁vedanāya ▁sampayutt o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
Hetuṁ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁hetu ṃ ▁dukkh āya ▁vedanāya ▁sampayutt aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nahetu ▁na dukkh āya ▁vedanāya ▁sampayutt o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuṁ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁hetu ṃ ▁adukkhamasukh āya ▁vedanāya ▁sampayutt aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nahetu ▁na adukkh am asukh āya ▁vedanāya ▁sampayutt o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ
